forum.content:
If you still don't have a clue what virtual reality is? It's about time to get yourself a Google Cardboard to explore a whole new world.

The technology is simple. You can either buy a pre-cut cardboard for as cheap as 30 NT$. Or you can make one by instructions provided by Google. Free!

Then download a few free APPs off the store with the keyboard "VR". Slot in your cellphone and you're good to go. Dislike me if you're not thrilled by its' amazing effects.

This is Jim the Half Honky. Looking forward to share more fun stuff here with you guys.
forum.title: Let's VR with our cell phone
